channel.title: Apollo Client
channel.description:
Hi MoparScape,
I downloaded the Apollo 317/377 server and got it up and running, however, I cannot find a client that is compatible with the server. I have tried at least 5 317's and 377's, and they all give me an error message (server sided) stating that the "Secure payload length mismatch." or "Invalid secure payload id.". Can someone please link me to a Apollo compatible client?
Here is the repo I am using for the server: https://github.com/apollo-rsps/apollo
Regards, Nemo

item.title: Apollo Client
item.dc:creator: @Nemo93 Nemo93
item.description:
@Nemo93 wrote:

Hi MoparScape,

I downloaded the Apollo 317/377 server and got it up and running, however, I cannot find a client that is compatible with the server.
I have tried at least 5 317’s and 377’s, and they all give me an error message (server sided) stating that the “Secure payload length mismatch.” or “Invalid secure payload id.”. Can someone please link me to a Apollo compatible client?

Here is the repo I am using for the server: https://github.com/apollo-rsps/apollo

Regards,
Nemo
